name: radioscope
description: A JavaScript run-time visualizer with head-to-head code fighting.

scripts.dev: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd Web&&npm run dev"&npm run _api_dev
scripts.dev_mq: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd Web&&SET AMQP=true&&npm run dev"&npm run _api_dev_mq
scripts._api_dev_mq: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd API&&SET AMQP=true&&npm run dev"
scripts.jest: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd Web&&npm run jest"&start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd API&&npm run jest"
scripts.postinstall: cd Web&&npm install&&npm run build&&cd ../API&&npm install

author: Zachary Mayer
